data.description: Join Our Team Innovative Defense Technologies (IDT) is an information technology company headquartered in Arlington, Virginia. Founded in 2006, IDT designs best-in-class solutions that facilitate the rapid delivery of software-based capabilities for the U.S. Department of Defense. Our entire team works together in an entrepreneurial atmosphere marked by innovation and excellence. Learn More Benefits At IDT, our employees' well-being is important to us and we are always looking for innovative ways to enhance the benefit programs we offer. We strive to offer high-quality benefits with reputable, nationwide carriers who will partner with our employees to meet our unique insurance needs. Our goal is to have a well-rounded suite of benefits that meet the needs of our employees and their families.
